amendment.description: Amendment en bloc comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 117-95: Nos 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, and 10.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, and 10, printed in Part B of House Report 117-95.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tonko amendments (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 195 (Roll no. 215).
